name: KWC_Prototype3
description:
Follow the arrow and get to the goal while avoiding obstacles. 

Controls:

Use "space bar" : move to the next role 

Hit "P" or "L" according to label on obstacles

Please leave me a comment or fill in the form to provide feedback for the game!
